extension.description: Resumes selectable states (music, video, slideshow, window etc) by monitoring and saving the current states into a database at a defined interval. It then resumes the saved state on XBMC start-up. Due to the constant monitoring, the script is designed to work with unexpected XBMC shutdowns.
